sys_remote_update_set.description: Liked having the email client icon right on your forms in Fuji? This yanks the email client button out from the (...) menu, and places it back where it belongs.
sys_remote_update_set.name: UI16: Email icon on form headers

sys_update_xml.payload:
truetrueFor UI16, pulls the email client button out of the (...) menu and places it back on the form. Requires g_scratchpad.isConcourse to be populated in a display business rule.activetrueUI16: email icon back on formsys_script_clientadmin_SHARE2016-05-31 15:47:49trueglobal/c0e5e4e80f7f5200b14545ace1050e6024UI16: email icon back on formglobalfalseglobalsys_script_client_c0e5e4e80f7f5200b14545ace1050e60admin_SHARE2016-05-31 16:55:30task

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_trigger"><sys_trigger action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application/><calendar/><claimed_by/><document/><document_key/><error_count>0</error_count><job_context/><job_id display_value="RunScriptJob">81c92ce9c0a8016400e5f0d2f784ea78</job_id><last_error/><log>false</log><maintenance>false</maintenance><max_drift/><name>Share Install Logger</name><next_action>2014-01-01 23:29:16</next_action><parent/><priority>100</priority><processing_duration>0</processing_duration><repeat/><run_count>0</run_count><run_dayofmonth/><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_month>1</run_month><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_weekinmonth>1</run_weekinmonth><script>var logClient = new GlideSimpleHTTPClient('https://share.servicenow.com/installLogger.do');
var query_string = 'installed_by=' + gs.getUserName() + '&instance_name=' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '&artifact=c55ab020137712404e8cd4a76144b0f0&content=855a3420137712404e8cd4a76144b01f';
gs.log('posting to: ' + query_string);
logClient.get(query_string);</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>0</trigger_type></sys_trigger></record_update>
